00032     @Override
00033     public String getItems(String[] table, String[] fields, String[] idFields, 
00034             String[] ids, String[] orderBy) {
00035         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00036 
00037         if (fields == null) {
00038             sb.append("SELECT * FROM ");
00039         } else {
00040             sb.append("SELECT ");
00041             for(int i=0;i<fields.length-1;i++) {
00042                  sb.append(fields[i]);
00043                  if (i < fields.length-1) {
00044                      sb.append(", ");
00045                  }
00046             }
00047             sb.append(" FROM ");
00048         }
00049         for(int i=0;i<table.length;i++) {
00050             sb.append(table[i]);
00051             if (i<table.length-1) {
00052                 sb.append(",");
00053             }
00054         }
00055         sb.append(createWhereClause(idFields, ids));
00056 
00057         if (orderBy != null) {
00058             sb.append(" ORDER BY ");
00059             sb.append(orderBy);
00060         }
00061         System.err.println("SqlQueryEngine.getItems() returns " + sb.toString());
00062         return sb.toString();
00063     }

00071     @Override
00072     public String addItem(String table, Object toAdd) {
00073         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00074         StringBuilder sbFields = new StringBuilder();
00075         StringBuilder sbValues = new StringBuilder();
00076         
00077         sb.append("INSERT INTO ");
00078         sb.append(table);
00079         sb.append(" VALUES ");
00080 
00081         sbFields.append("(");
00082         sbValues.append("(");
00083         
00084         for (Field f: toAdd.getClass().getDeclaredFields()) {
00085             String fieldName = f.getName();
00086             if (fieldName.startsWith("field_")) {
00087 
00088                 String type = f.getClass().getName();
00089                 String value = new String();
00090                 sbFields.append(fieldName);
00091                 if (type.equals("String")) {
00092                     sbValues.append("'");
00093                     try {
00094                         sbValues.append(f.get(value));
00095                     } catch (Exception e) {
00096                         System.err.println("No such field!");
00097                     }
00098                     sbValues.append("'");
00099                 } else {
00100                     try {
00101                         sbValues.append(f.get(value));
00102                     } catch (Exception e) {
00103                         System.err.println("No such field!" + e.getMessage());
00104                     }
00105                 }
00106                 sbFields.append(",");
00107                 sbValues.append(",");
00108             }
00109         }
00110         // Remove extra commas and add missing closing parentheses
00111         sb.append(sbFields.toString().substring(0, sbFields.toString().length()-1));
00112         sb.append(")");
00113         sb.append(sbValues.toString().substring(0, sbValues.toString().length()-1));
00114         sb.append(")");
00115 
00116         System.err.println("addItems returns " + sb.toString());
00117         return sb.toString();
00118     }

00129     @Override
00130     public String deleteItems(String table, String[] idFields, String[] ids) {
00131         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00132 
00133         sb.append("DELETE FROM ");
00134         sb.append(table);
00135         sb.append(createWhereClause(idFields, ids));
00136 
00137         return sb.toString();
00138     }
00139 
00146     private String createWhereClause(String[] idFields, String[] ids) {
00147         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
00148 
00149         if (idFields != null && ids != null) {
00150             sb.append(" WHERE ");
00151             for(int i=0;i<idFields.length;i++) {
00152                 sb.append(idFields[i] + " = ");
00153                 sb.append(ids[i]);
00154                 if (i < ids.length-1) {
00155                     sb.append(" AND ");
00156                 }
00157             }
00158         }
00159         return sb.toString();
00160     }
